summary: Adds an armor set to go with the Nord Hero weapons you can obtain after the Companion\'s quest line
descriptionHtml:
==========
Description
==========
This mod adds a standalone retextured version of the Ancient Nord Armor titled the Nord Hero Armor. I made this mod because I found it odd that there was Ancient Nord weapons and armor, but only Nord Hero weapons. Well, now there is.

========
Location
========
The armor can be found deep within Yngol Barrow or crafted at the Skyforge with the Advanced Armor smithing perk. The helmet should work with beast races, but I haven\'t tried it yet. 

================
Body Mod Support
================
I\'ve just been informed in the comments that since this is just a retexture and .esp, this mod automatically works with all body mods out there as long as you have the mesh for the Ancient Nord Armor.

==========
Installation
==========
Either...
Install with Nexus Mod Manager (recommended)
or...
Drag contents of file into Data folder

============
Uninstallation
============
Either...(depending on install)
Uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager(recommended)
or...
Delete textures/armor/Nord Hero and .esp from data folder

=========
Permission
=========
Please ask me before you use anything in this mod for your own mod.
If you do I can almost guarantee I will say yes.

======
Credits
======
Bethesda for the Creation Kit and Skyrim
GIMP creators for GIMP


Give feedback in the comments.
author: Hatwig
